Private Sub GMapControl1_MouseMove(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs) Handles MyBase.MouseMove

    Dim X As Double = GMapControl1.FromLocalToLatLng(e.X, e.Y).Lng
    Dim Y As Double = GMapControl1.FromLocalToLatLng(e.X, e.Y).Lat

    Dim longitude As String = X.ToString()
    Dim latitude As String = Y.ToString()
    Label1.Text = longitude
    Label2.Text = latitude
End Sub
this works only inside the form , when i move the mouse inside the gmapcontrol nothing happen
